title: Furious The Chase fan's hilarious rant sums up how everyone felt about last night's shock episode
text:
Showbiz Furious The Chase fan's hilarious rant sums up how everyone felt about last night's shock episode He's been hailed a 'legend' as thousands of other people were probably shouting at the telly in a similar fashion Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now The Chase fan is fuming over contestant's shock decision Share this video Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
Do you ever get so sucked into a show you find yourself shouting at the telly - even though it'll make no difference at all? 
One man has found himself an overnight social media celebrity after his step-daughter shared a hilarious video of his reaction to The Chase . 
He was watching last night's episode when, along with thousands of other viewers, the decisions of some of the contestants made him absolutely furious. 
It all started when Darragh went head-to-head against the Chaser and managed to bag £9,000 for the group pot. 
You'd hope the other contestants could have similar success and get an impressive amount of money in the bag - but that's where the good news ended. Three members of the team were hugely unpopular 
Michael, fair play to him, only took the 'low' offer and added another £300 to the team total. 
But Carole chose to go for -£1,000 and Georgia opted for -£2,000, resulting in accusations they 'backstabbed' their teammate to win the cash. It's fair to say everyone on Twitter was pretty angry. 
You can see evidence of that below - but raging the most was Shayna's stepdad. In the hilarious clip he clutches the remote and launches a foul-mouthed attack on Carole, who took the offer from the Chaser. 
He says: "F***ing going on the programmes and then take a minus offer. Not impressed. (Photo: Twitter/@Shanyaaa24) 
"F***in' boy's hard work undone." 
Basically, it's how every viewer of The Chase felt last night. 
Shayna told Mirror Online her family sits down to watch the show every night before dinner at 5pm and her step dad is "always talking to the TV". 
The clip, which she shared on Twitter, has had over 2,000 retweets since last night. Shayna said: "He's now the family celeb thanks to me." 
Other viewers admitted they were also swearing at the TV, called him a legend and said it's the "funniest thing they've ever seen". Someone even started a #JusticeForDarragh hashtag And one suggested they should set up a GoFundMe page 
Another person went a step further and ACTUALLY SET ONE UP. There were Wanted posters And someone even amended the dictionary definition for 'coward' One person tweeted the police Trump has got nothing on The Chase 
The backlash has even prompted Darragh, the contestant who put £9,000 into the pot, to take to Twitter in defence of his teammates. 
He said: "Ease off my teammates. It's a lot easier on the couch." 
He then added: "Thanks for all the support but I would appreciate it if people eased off my teammates. Its (sic) hard in front of the cameras." Like us on Facebook
